price: تەقۋادارلارلا پەرۋەردىگارىنى كۆرمەي تۇرۇپ، ئۇنىڭدىن قورقىدۇ ھەمدە ئۇلار قىيامەتنىڭ (دەھشىتىدىن) تىترىگۈچىلەردۇر[49].
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
